settings.title: the golden vacation giveaway
settings.text: To celebrate our pop-up at The Grove, weâ€™re partnering with The Luxe Nomad to giveaway the vacation of all vacations. One lucky winner and a friend of their choosing will experience 6 nights of Bali in luxury. The lucky winner and their guest will have the vacation of their lifetime with this prize package: - a total of 6 glamorous nights in Bali - 3 nights in Villa Florimar - 3 nights in Villa KaRein - free roundtrip flights to Bali - head-to-toe Monday looks for each day of - transportation to and from the Bali airport and between villas Open to US residents, aged 18+. Enter below.
